original_title: กลิ้งไว้ก่อน พ่อสอนไว้
overview: The story of a group of 12th grade students named Rolling Stone which has Kan the chairman of the Rolling Stone group. artistic talent but likes to use it in a way that is not very good, Mhee is a lover but heartbroken throughout the story, Big, the president of the basketball club, looks good But the fart is very foul and Koi, who has the ability to speak Thai is to stutter every word The four of them were a group of sassy students. create problems for schools every year.
title: Rolling Stone
